product_name: Nathan Speed 2R Auto-Cant Hydration Waistpack - 16 fl. oz. - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Stay hydrated on long-distance runs with the Nathan Speed 2R Auto-Cant hydration waistpack. It carries the load of water and other essentials around your hips so you can run with hands-free comfort. 2 individual 8oz. flasks provide easy access to 16 total ounces of water; intuitively placed holsters tilt outward for easy access that won't interfere with arm swing. Zippered pocket securely holds phone, ID and energy gels; additional pocket is perfect for storing a house key. Breathable nylon/polyester mesh fabric helps keep your skin cool, comfortable and chafe-free. Closeout.
short_description: Stay hydrated on long-distance runs with the Nathan Speed 2R Auto-Cant hydration waistpack. It carries the load of water and other essentials around your hips so you can run with hands-free comfort.
